synergy.title: Integration Synergy of 5 Core Principles
synergy.subtitle: How the Golden Standard Works
synergy.intro: The 2025 Golden Standard operates as a complementary system where the 5 core principles are not individual features, but an integrated network. Each principle compensates for others' weaknesses and amplifies their strengths.

layer1.title: Layer 1: Primary Perception
layer1.synergy: Color distinction + Letter clarity = Immediate information recognition
layer1.applications: Chart legends, axis labels, data labels

layer2.title: Layer 2: Validated Visibility
layer2.combination: Contrast (WCAG 2.2) = Quality assurance for Color and Typography
layer2.synergy: Numerical validation that Layer 1 actually works
layer2.users: Low vision, presbyopia, bright environment users

layer3.title: Layer 3: Redundant Encoding
layer3.synergy: Backup identification through patterns when color information is lost
layer3.applications: Bar chart hatching, line graph styles, data point shapes
layer3.users: Colorblind users, black & white print users

layer4.title: Layer 4: Infinite Scalability
layer4.synergy: All elements from Layer 1-3 preserved during magnification
layer4.users: Screen magnifier users, screen reader users
